Title: Genome-wide analysis of Differential Responses of Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 and PA14 cells to Interfacial Stress
Description: Analysis of gene expression level of P. aeruginosa confined to Hexadecane-water interfaces. The hypothesis tested in the present study was to determine if interfacial confinements at hexadecane-water affect microbial metabolism through regulation of stress response.
